Manipulating dates is a crucial skill in health data analysis, as date-related data, from patient admission dates to vaccination schedules, plays a vital role in epidemiological studies. To strengthen this skill, I completed part 1 of the course, which covered how R stores and displays dates and provided techniques for effectively manipulating, parsing, and formatting them. You can refer [here](https://lawaloa.github.io/date_1/){target="_blank"} for further review
